references.paper_title: Cosmos world foundation model platform for physical ai
references.reason: This work presents a foundational model for physical AI, which directly relates to enhancing physical fidelity in video generation, which is a core focus of the paper.

references.paper_title: Video generation models as world simulators
references.reason: This reference is very relevant as it treats video generation models as world simulators, which relates to the understanding and generation of physically plausible videos.
MaskGIT is foundational for generative image transformations, likely influencing the architecture used for video generation in this paper.

references.paper_title: Visual physics: Discovering physical laws from videos
references.reason: This reference demonstrates an attempt to learn physical laws from videos, aligning with the goal of enhancing physical fidelity in video synthesis.

references.paper_title: Next-generation deep learning based on simulators and synthetic data
references.reason: This trend explores the use of simulators and synthetic data in deep learning, which forms the basis of the synthetic data augmentation strategy used in the current paper.
